verses.text: Let us sing to the Lord, for he is gloriously proclaimed: horse and rider he has thrown into the sea.
A helper and protector he has become to me for salvation: he is my God and I will glorify him; my father's God and I will exalt him.
The Lord is a crusher of wars: the Lord is his name.
Attend, O heaven, and I will speak; and let the earth hear the words from my mouth.
Let my speech be looked for as the rain, and let my words come down as the dew.
My heart is established in the Lord, my horn is exalted in my God; my mouth is enlarged over my enemies, I have rejoiced in thy salvation.
O Lord, I heard thy report and was afraid; O Lord, I considered thy works and was amazed.
Out of the night my spirit rises early to thee, O God, because thy commandments are a light upon the earth.
I cried out in my affliction to the Lord my God, and he heard me; out of the belly of Hades thou heardest my cry.

chapters.title: The Seventh Ode of the Three Holy Children

verses.text: Blessed art thou, O Lord, the God of our fathers, and praised and glorified is thy name unto the ages.

chapters.title: The Eighth Ode of the Three Holy Children

verses.text: Bless the Lord, all ye works of the Lord: sing his praises and highly exalt him unto the ages.
My soul doth magnify the Lord, and my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Savior.
For he hath regarded the lowliness of his handmaiden: for behold from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.
